page.title: 03QUARRYING IN 1985
page.content: { The two remaining quarries are owned by{Tarmac Roadstone. Hillhead quarry is used as a transport storage depot and workshop. In June this year there was an exhibition of quarrying equipment which attracted people from as far away as Australia and Singapore. It was the largest quarry plant show in the world. The exhibition was organised by the {Institute of Quarrying}and will be staged at Hillhead every two years as Tarmac have been so helpful and have turned part of their quarry into a permanent site for the exhibition. It was a trade show but many Buxton people attended as so many are employed in the industry. Part of the quarry is used to make concrete blocks & tile by{Forticrete.
